title: Introduction
text: Overview of LaraQL for effortless GraphQL integration in Laravel.

title: Installation
text: Step-by-step guide to installing LaraQL via Composer.

title: Configuration
text: How to publish and customize LaraQL scan paths and settings.

title: Basic Usage
text: Getting started with PHP attributes to define your GraphQL schema.

title: Model Attribute Overview
text: Using the Model attribute to auto-generate types and mutations.

title: Model Operations
text: Configuring CRUD operations for specific Eloquent models.

title: Model Directives
text: Applying Lighthouse directives directly via the Model attribute.

title: Model Type Override
text: Customizing the generated GraphQL Type for a model.

title: Model Input Override
text: Customizing the generated GraphQL Input for a model.

title: Model Authorization
text: Securing model queries and mutations with Laravel Policies.

title: Type Attribute Overview
text: Defining custom GraphQL Object Types using PHP attributes.

title: Type Name
text: Explicitly naming your GraphQL types.

title: Type Paginator
text: Configuring pagination styles for types.

title: Type Columns
text: Defining which model columns are exposed in the type.

title: Type Columns Override
text: Selectively overriding specific column definitions.

title: Type Extended Type
text: Extending existing GraphQL types with new fields.

title: Input Attribute Overview
text: Defining custom GraphQL Input types for mutations.

title: Input Name
text: Setting custom names for GraphQL Input objects.

title: Input Inputs
text: Defining fields available within the input object.

title: Input Inputs Override
text: Overriding specific input field definitions.

title: Query Attribute Overview
text: Defining single-record GraphQL queries via attributes.

title: Query Name
text: Customizing the query name in the schema.

title: Query Return Type
text: Specifying what type a query should return.

title: Query Directives
text: Applying middleware or resolver directives to queries.

title: Query Filters
text: Adding where clauses and filtering to your queries.

title: Query Query Implementation
text: Defining custom resolver logic for queries.

title: QueryCollection
text: Handling lists, pagination, and sorting for multiple records.

title: QueryCollection Pagination
text: Configuring Paginator or Simple Paginator.

title: QueryCollection Filtering
text: Advanced filtering for collections.

title: QueryCollection Sorting
text: Defining sortable columns for collection queries.

title: QueryCollection Scout Support
text: Integrating Laravel Scout for full-text search.

title: Mutation Attribute
text: Creating, Updating, and Deleting data via GraphQL mutations.

title: Credits
text: LaraQL credits and information about the Lighthouse PHP engine.
